  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED ON THE BELT; THE BOTTOM OF THE BOX WAS WET AND COVERED IN TAPE FROM PREVIOUS FACILITY. AFTER OPENING BOX TO CHECK CONTENTS IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT MULTIPLE BOTTLE SEALS WERE BROKEN AND CONTENTS LEAKED INSIDE THE BOX.

item.title: Report E-2024120023
item.description:
Report E-2024120023

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-05T12:24:28+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-04
  • City: BRAINTREE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0704 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal. It was reported that approximately 5 grams of UN1490 CAIROXÂ® potassium permanganate released from (2) 5-Gallon's poly pails due to improper loading. The release impacted trailer # 4651159. No storm drains or waterways are reported to be impacted by the release. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are not capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. The terminal containerized the release in a 20-Gallon poly drum for the waste.
